name: R.O.S.C.O.P.E
description: R.O.S.C.O.P.E is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is an esteemed member of the WebtrES club. With its shiny yellow box, soldier buttons, rocket arms and legs, and a red and black screen, R.O.S.C.O.P.E stands out as a remarkable creation in the world of robotics.
